calculatePremium(uint256).details: Calculate premium amount (5% of coverage amount)

returns._0: premium The premium amount in USDT (6 decimals)

claimPolicy(uint256).details: Claim insurance (can be called by authorized service or user)

getPremiumAmount().details: Get the standard premium amount (for UI display) This returns a fixed premium for simplicity, or can be calculated based on a standard coverage

purchasePolicy(uint256).details: Purchase an insurance policy for a tontine

params.tontineId: The ID of the tontine to insure

returns._0: policyId The ID of the newly created policy

userPolicies(address,uint256).details: Get policy ID at index for a user

userPolicyCount(address).details: Get number of policies for a user
